lead_paragraph: BOSTON (AP) — Red Sox pitcher Curt Schilling could be throwing off a mound by January after having surgery on his shoulder Monday. That keeps him on target to pitch by the middle of next season if he decides to return.
snippet: BOSTON (AP) — Red Sox pitcher Curt Schilling could be throwing off a mound by January after having surgery on his shoulder Monday. That keeps him on target to pitch by the middle of next season if he decides to return.
